high_descs: Turn around, walk up to the window, then turn right to face the side of the desk.
Pick up the yellow pencil that is on the desk.
Turn right and walk across the room to the small nightstand that is next to the door.
Turn on the lamp that sits on the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil using the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Pick up a pencil from the desk
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pencil and turn on a lamp

high_descs: Turn around and walk across the room, then turn right at the desk against the wall.
Pick up the pencil to the left of the credit card and the pen.
Turn to your right and go to the night stand across the room.
Turn on the light in the right, back corner, on the night stand.
